name: E-commerce Dashboard
summary:
A comprehensive e-commerce dashboard built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features real-time analytics, inventory management, and order processing capabilities.

## Key Features
- Real-time sales analytics
- Inventory tracking
- Order management
- Customer insights
- Mobile-responsive design

name: Task Management App
summary:
A collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates.

## Features
- Kanban board interface
- Real-time collaboration
- File attachments
- Due date tracking

name: Weather Forecast Widget
summary: A responsive weather widget that displays current conditions and 7-day forecasts with beautiful animations.
